original_text: And he put the wood in order and cut the bull in pieces and laid it on the wood. And he said, “Fill four jars with water and pour it on the burnt offering and on the wood.”
korean_text: 또 나무를 벌이고 송아지의 각을 떠서 나무 위에 놓고 이르되 통 넷에 물을 채워다가 번제물과 나무 위에 부으라 하고

sentences.original_text: And he put the wood in order
and cut the bull in pieces
and laid it on the wood.
and pour it on the burnt offering and on the wood.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그 물을 번제물과 나무 위에 부으라.”
